values.description: A Protective Collar is an Options strategy that consists of a covered call and a long put with a lower strike price than the short call contract.
values.keywords: Protective Collar option strategy, covered call, long put, limited-profit-limited-loss strategy, strategy payoff, risk of early assignment
values.og:description: A Protective Collar is an Options strategy that consists of a covered call and a long put with a lower strike price than the short call contract.
values.og:title: Protective Collar - Documentation QuantConnect.com
